awantgad samagama sambandhayen karunu hari hati nodana katha karamin boho deneku chodana ella kala bawath, mema wyaparayen danata 6754 denekuta rakiya ahimiwi athi bawath, ehi kandawumkaru kamal gamage pawasiya.ehidi wadiduratath adahas dakwamin ohu awantgad samagamen laba prayojana gath pudgalayin sambandhayen da adahas pala kaleya.
